channel.title: Msfvenom app connects only to port 4444 of ngrok
channel.description: I made a android apk using metasploit and msfvenom and ngrok to port forward.The meterpreter session doesn't start. Then I found that (with Packet Capture) the app was connecting to port 4444 of the 0.tcp.ngrok.io. Whereas i mentioned port 13*** in lhost when creaing the apk.I tried this many times. Still the app connects to port 4444.

item.title: Msfvenom app connects only to port 4444 of ngrok

item.description:
